title: Committees
content:
## Functions Howdy! We are Michael and Braylee, and we are thrilled to be your FUNctions Co-Chairs! Our committee brings the FUN to FEAST events such as holiday socials and formals. Watch out Class of 2026, the party planning people are ready to have a great year!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-13-.jpg)
## Fundraising Howdy! We are Kiley and Luke, and together the two of us are the Fundraising committee! Our main priorities are planning profit shares, arranging volunteers for an annual 5K, and running committee Olympics! We are so excited to meet the Class of 2026 and make fun memories planning events and hanging out at committee meetings!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-12-.jpg)
## Promo Howdy! Our names are Abby and Kiran and we are the Promo committee! We are in charge of designing all of FEAST's merch and making sure that our FLO has the most drip on campus! We design anything from t-shirts to sweatshirts to hats, and we want our freshmen to help us with this process. We can't wait to meet the Class of 2026 and have the best committee in FEAST! In the words of legendary poet Sergio Giavanni Kitchens, "Drip too hard, caution on the floor you gon' mess around and drown".
![](/images/uploads/tmp-10-.jpg)
## Service League Howdy! Our names are Sydney and Gabe and we are the Co-Chairs for Service League (A.K.A. Sleag)! Sleag is responsible for the service and philanthropy side of FEAST, which means we organize monthly service opportunities, street cleanups at our adopted stretch of University Drive, and a service retreat during winter break. We are excited to meet the Fightin' Texas Aggie Class of 2026 and together make an impact on the city of College Station through service events!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-9-.jpg)
## Leadership Howdy! We are the leadership committee. Our names are Ethan and Izzy, but more importantly we are the loudest and the proudest members of the Fightin Texas Aggie Class of 2025 A-A-A-A-A! Our committee is mostly in charge of events such as our fall and spring retreat along with organizing Shackathon for FEAST. If you are looking for a fun committee, definitely look out for Leadership!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-7-.jpg)
## 12th Man Howdy Army! Our names are Lauren and Courtland, and we are the 12th Man Co-Chairs! We are so excited to plan monthly good bull nights, pick the game of the week, and put on a sick tailgate. If you join 12th Man, be prepared to be in the most legendary and spirited committee ever. We can't wait to meet you Class of 2026, and let's get this year started!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-9-.jpg)
## Outreach
![](/images/uploads/tmp-11-.jpg)
